org.apache.ignite.ml.math

Interface MatrixStorage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Destroyable, Externalizable, Serializable, StorageOpsMetrics
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayMatrixStorage, BlockMatrixStorage, CacheMatrixStorage, DenseOffHeapMatrixStorage, DiagonalMatrixStorage, FunctionMatrixStorage, MatrixDelegateStorage, PivotedMatrixStorage, RandomMatrixStorage, SparseDistributedMatrixStorage, SparseLocalOnHeapMatrixStorage

    public interface MatrixStorage
extends Externalizable, StorageOpsMetrics, Destroyable
    Data storage support for Matrix.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int accessMode() 
      int columnSize() 
      default double[] data()
      Gets underlying data, if StorageOpsMetrics.isArrayBased() returns false this method return copy of data.

      int rowSize()

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.ignite.ml.math.StorageOpsMetrics

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.ignite.ml.math.Destroyable

        destroy

    • Method Detail

      • get

        double get(int x,
           int y)
        Parameters:
        x - Matrix row index.
        y - Matrix column index.
        Returns:
        Value corresponding to given row and column.

      • set

        void set(int x,
         int y,
         double v)
        Parameters:
        x - Matrix row index.
        y - Matrix column index.
        v - Value to set at given row and column.

      • storageMode

        int storageMode()
        Returns:
        Matrix elements storage mode.
        See Also:
        StorageConstants

      • accessMode

        int accessMode()
        Returns:
        Matrix access mode.
        See Also:
        StorageConstants

      • data

        default double[] data()
        Gets underlying data, if StorageOpsMetrics.isArrayBased() returns false this method return copy of data. The data must be adapted for Blas.
        See Also:
        StorageOpsMetrics.isArrayBased()
